'''Ndenge''', also known by his {{w|Goetic}} name '''Haborym''' and bearing the [[Ancient Name]] {{Ancient Name||'''Kiongozi'''|bearer=1}}, was a former [[God]] of War and [[Pyro Archon]] of [[Natlan]].<ref group="Note">Implied by the mention of his name alongside other Pyro Archons in ''[[Where All Hopes Lie]]'' and the description of [[Obsidian Ancient Name]].</ref>

He is one of the individuals that the Abyssal beast [[Gosoythoth]] mimics in its final battle against the [[Traveler]] and [[Mavuika]].
